volText: We connect travelers with trusted, ethical volunteer opportunities across Asia. From community infrastructure to conservation, we match you with organizations that produce measurable outcomes rather than feel-good photo ops.
heroSubtitle: Custom journeys and community-led projects across South and Southeast Asia.
aboutText1: We're a small-scale travel company tired of mass-tourism. We believe travel should feel personal, respectful, and constructive. Every journey with us is custom-tailored and almost all of the profit is reinvested into community-led projects.
aboutText2: We're committed to ending exploitative practices like elephant riding and poverty tourism. Your money has an impact even after your trip is finished.
description: Mitria is a small-scale travel company built on genuine connections with communities across South and Southeast Asia.
